analysis.description:
subsistanceToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/25/0x3d01bb49a9a16acb56d2f7f010f0a35b9a168a88.sol#128) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0x3d01bb49a9a16acb56d2f7f010f0a35b9a168a88.sol#246-259)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/25/0x3d01bb49a9a16acb56d2f7f010f0a35b9a168a88.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/25/0x3d01bb49a9a16acb56d2f7f010f0a35b9a168a88.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/25/0x3d01bb49a9a16acb56d2f7f010f0a35b9a168a88.sol#103) is not in mixedCase
